casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Terance Germaine MALACHI 142P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 4, 2017 Aaron Thomas Johnson, Assistant Appellate Defender, Constance E. Widenhouse, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Malachi, Terance Germaine. John R. Green, Jr., Special Deputy Attorney General, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th of May 2017 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th of May 2017."
